issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: h3. How Can I disable plugins that I dont use ?. It exists some panel ?

comments.body:
Hello,

To disable the plugins . Here is how:

Go to Help -> Installation Details. Click the Plug-ins tabs to find out what you want to remove.
Every feature or plugin has a Feature ID, shown in a column of the same name. This is just the name of its JAR file.

Close Appcelerator Studio. Go to the directory where Appcelerator Studio is installed. To remove a plugins, go to the plugins directory. Delete the directory or JAR file. Restart Appcelerator Studio.
